904390.name: Revelation Online — Free Steam Welcome Pack
904390.description:
Welcome to Revelation Online! We have a small welcome present for all new players joining us from Steam. This Free Steam Welcome Pack contains a permanent title and head accessory!

Steam Adventurer Title

A purple title which you can equip in the Titles Menu within the Character window which you can access by pressing "C". This title appears above your head and is viewable to everyone around you.

Little Hyphaean

Enjoy the company of this Little Hyphaean who sits atop your head while you go about on your adventure!




You will not be able to use a Steam-purchased Pack or Items on any account that was not created via Steam. If your account was created pre-Steam integration, or you created it via the Mycom Game Center from our official website, simply head to our website store page instead. All the purchased DLC will appear in the web site inventory. You will need to log into the game in order to receive your DLCs in your web inventory. If you are already logged into the game, please log out and back into the game. Please click "Redeem your DLC" banner in Game Center to get to the web inventory for your account.
